org.postgresql.pljava.internal

Class SPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.postgresql.pljava.internal.SPI

  • public class SPI
extends Object
    The SPI class provides access to some global variables used by SPI.
    Author:
    Thomas Hallgren
